attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cross Country can't keep services on time, and it isn't to do with signal failure! it's due to the staff not turning up & train failures, i will give you an example of a constant delayed service, 0600 Glasgow-Bournmeouth last month 4 times in a row service was started at Edinburgh due to staff being unavailable, last month involved in a fatality at curriehill, This month June, service has been delayed 25th it was 20 minutes late due to staff, 26th 77 minutes late due animals on the line, which can't be helped but today 28th it is around 50 mintues late due to late staff, we need a proper train not a stupid bus operater!, even down south there must be about 30 services a day cancelled or delayed due to staff, as it says on the "Cross country website" give us virgin trains back, they know how to run a train company! we were promised more services to Glasgow from them if anything there are less there are none during the day with only 1at night and one in the morning!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
